data.title: Lesotho National Development Corporation
data.text:
PRESS RELEASE For Immediate Release

28 Loetse 2021

Koporasi ea Ntlafatso Ea Moruo Lesotho (LNDC) e tla bula ka molao ‘maraka oa meroho le litholoana “Maluti Fresh Produce Market” ka la 7 Pulungoana 2021 sebakeng sa lifeme sa Ha-Tikoe Maseru. Mokete ona otla tlotlisoa ka boteng ba Mohlomphehi Tonakholo Dr Moeketsi Majoro.

PHATLALATSO

E lokolloe hang hang ka la

23 Loetse 2021

Phepelo ea Lijo Thollo Leloaleng la Lesotho Milling Company

Leloala la Lesotho Milling Company (LMC) e fumanehang Maputsoe (Leribe) le sila phoofo ea boleng bo holimo ea poone le koro boemong ba ‘maraka oa lehae le oa machaba.

ANNUAL AWARDS COMPETITION FOR TRADE AND INVESTMENT

Submitted by lndcadmin on Wed, 05/12/2021 - 08:57

Exporter of the Year Award

Call for Applications and General Terms and Conditions

a) Nominations are invited from companies who are currently supplying or exporting to South African and US Markets to participate in an Exporter Competition.

b) Award

The National award winner will be given a trophy and automatically qualify for the Regional (SACU +3) competition.

The Lesotho National Development Corporation (LNDC) is the main parastatal of the Government of Lesotho charged with the implementation of the country’s industrial development policies.

“The mandate of the Corporation is to initiate, promote and facilitate the development of manufacturing and processing industries, mining and commerce in a manner calculated to raise the level of income and employment in Lesotho.” more...
